attributes.action: Trigger "Article 50"  straightaway, as promised by David Cameron pre-referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Procrastination is causing unnecessary unease for both sides. People need action for security and in order to move forward.
attributes.background: Mr Cameron stated quote clearly that in the event of a winning Brexit vote, Article 50 would immediately be triggered to commence divorce from the EU. This has not yet been emplaced, so the following petitioners request Mr Cameron fulfills his part of the deal with immediate effect.
